entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending this evening then clearing. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
